path.details:
--path Path
   Required. Sets the start or root path. Default is ../custom-reports

output.customFieldPath:
--output-path-customFields Path
   Sets the path to a custom directory for .jrxml files with matching keywords. Default is ./custom-field-finder-output
output.loneJasperPath:
--output-path-loneJaspers Path
   Sets the path to a custom directory for .jrxml files with an accompanying .jasper. Default is ./custom-field-finder-output
output.disableCustomFields:
--output-disable-customFields
   Disables output files for .jrxmls with matching keywords
output.disableLoneJaspers:
--output-disable-loneJaspers
   Disables output files for .jrxmls without accompanying .jaspers

log.all:
--log-all
   Enables logging at all available steps
